topic.title: How to Make Chapters Look Like Individual Publications

body.note: This topic is only for the pdf-css transformation type.
body.p: Sometimes you want to make each chapter independent, i.e. it can be read separately, as an separate part of your publication. For this you need the page counter, figure and table counters to restart at each chapter.
Depending on the numbering you prefer, you should use different CSS rules.
